summary: Completed testing of JAIPUR Fine Wood Furniture app client feedback improvements. Backend APIs mostly functional (9/10 tests passed). Frontend features partially working - Factory Inform Date field implemented, Entry Date shows DD-MM-YYYY format, Category dropdown has '+ Add New Category' option, and PDF export working. However, Categories POST API failing with 520 error, and product images not displaying in preview to verify size requirements.

critical_bugs.issue: POST request returns 520 Internal Server Error when creating new category
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks '+ Add New Category' functionality in frontend

ui_bugs.issue: Only 1 date input field found instead of expected 2 (Entry Date + Factory Inform Date)

integration_issues.issue: Product images not displaying - shows 'No Image Available'
integration_issues.impact: Cannot verify product image size requirement (min 220px height)

passed_tests: Factories, Leather, and Finish library APIs
Orders CRUD with Factory Inform Date field
Orders with multiple items (5 items tested successfully)
Factory Inform Date label found on Edit Order page
Category dropdown contains '+ Add New Category' option
Factory Inform Date displayed in Order Preview
PDF export button available in preview

success_percentage.backend: 90% (9/10 tests passed - Categories POST API failing)
success_percentage.frontend: 75% (Most features working, but product images not displaying and date field count issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Categories POST API 520 error to enable '+ Add New Category' functionality. Investigate why product images are not displaying in Order Preview (shows 'No Image Available') - this prevents verification of the 220px height requirement. Check if Factory Inform Date input field is properly implemented alongside Entry Date field.
